name: bathtubcig-static-site
description: Static site for bathtub cig (GitHub Pages)

scripts.start: npm run build && npx serve build -p 3000
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:content
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "node scripts/build-content.js --watch" "npx serve build -p 3000"
scripts.serve: npm run build && npx serve build -p 3000
